name: MUSS (Multiple Users, Same System)
short_description:
"Multiple Users Same System" was an effort to enable more than one user use the same computer. The support for keyboard and mouse drivers was added, then development stopped. The hope was, by the combination of this project and a virtualization software (like VMware™), and of course proper hardware, different users could use the same computer system simultaneously. This project has now become obsolete.

Due to complicated nature of software and a long time passed from original development and also since the code is no more useful, an organized source code upload is out of scope, now.

In a very special case a cd containing unorganized sources maybe available.

For a replacement to reach the goal of the project, one can use a very cheap computer (laptop) to remote desktop to a VMware machine or vnc to it.
